item.title: Are You Making This Common Mistake With 'Robot'? Find Out Now!
item.description: Introduction Robots are becoming an increasingly important part of our lives, and we need to understand how to use them properly. In this article, we’ll discuss the common mistake people make with robots and how to avoid it. Definition of “Robot” A robot is a machine that is capable of carrying out a complex series of actions automatically. They are used in a variety of settings, from manufacturing to home automation.
